segments.source_content: # Using Plugins

**The Docusaurus core doesn't provide any feature of its own.** All features are delegated to individual plugins: the [docs](./guides/docs/docs-introduction.mdx) feature provided by the [docs plugin](./api/plugins/plugin-content-docs.mdx); the [blog](./blog.mdx) feature provided by the [blog plugin](./api/plugins/plugin-content-blog.mdx); or individual [pages](./guides/creating-pages.mdx) provided by the [pages plugin](./api/plugins/plugin-content-pages.mdx). If there are no plugins installed, the site won't contain any routes.

translations.zh-hant: **Docusaurus 核心本身不提供任何功能。** 所有功能都委託給個別插件實現：[文檔功能](./guides/docs/docs-introduction.mdx)由[文檔插件](./api/plugins/plugin-content-docs.mdx)提供；[部落格功能](./blog.mdx)由[部落格插件](./api/plugins/plugin-content-blog.mdx)提供；而獨立[頁面](./guides/creating-pages.mdx)則由[頁面插件](./api/plugins/plugin-content-pages.mdx)提供。若未安裝任何插件，網站將不會包含任何路由。

segments.source_content: You may not need to install common plugins one-by-one though: they can be distributed as a bundle in a [preset](#using-presets). For most users, plugins are configured through the preset configuration.

translations.zh-hant: 您無需逐一手動安裝常見插件：它們可以透過[預設集](#using-presets)以套件形式分發。對多數使用者而言，插件是透過預設集配置進行設定的。

segments.source_content: We maintain a [list of official plugins](./api/plugins/overview.mdx), but the community has also created some [unofficial plugins](/community/resources#community-plugins). If you want to add any feature: autogenerating doc pages, executing custom scripts, integrating other services... be sure to check out the list: someone may have implemented it for you!

translations.zh-hant: 我們維護了一份[官方插件清單](./api/plugins/overview.mdx)，社群也開發了部分[非官方插件](/community/resources#community-plugins)。若您想新增任何功能：自動生成文檔頁面、執行自訂腳本、整合其他服務...請務必查閱該清單：可能已有人為您實現了該功能！

segments.source_content: If you are feeling energetic, you can also read [the plugin guide](./advanced/plugins.mdx) or [plugin method references](./api/plugin-methods/README.mdx) for how to make a plugin yourself.

translations.zh-hant: 若您精力充沛，也可以閱讀[插件指南](./advanced/plugins.mdx)或[插件方法參考文檔](./api/plugin-methods/README.mdx)來了解如何自行開發插件。

segments.source_content: ## Installing a plugin {#installing-a-plugin}
A plugin is usually an npm package, so you install them like other npm packages using npm.

translations.zh-hant: 插件通常是 npm 套件，因此您可以使用 npm 像安裝其他 npm 套件一樣安裝它們。

segments.source_content:
```bash npm2yarn
npm install --save docusaurus-plugin-name
```
Then you add it in your site's `docusaurus.config.js`'s `plugins` option:

translations.zh-hant: 然後在您網站的 `docusaurus.config.js` 的 `plugins` 選項中添加該插件：

segments.source_content: Docusaurus can also load plugins from your local directory, with something like the following:

translations.zh-hant: Docusaurus 也可以從本地目錄載入插件，如下所示：

segments.source_content: Paths should be absolute or relative to the config file.

translations.zh-hant: 路徑應為絕對路徑或相對於配置文件的相對路徑。

segments.source_content: ## Configuring plugins {#configuring-plugins}
For the most basic usage of plugins, you can provide just the plugin name or the path to the plugin.

translations.zh-hant: 對於插件的最基本用法，您可以僅提供插件名稱或插件路徑。

segments.source_content: However, plugins can have options specified by wrapping the name and an options object in a two-member tuple inside your config. This style is usually called "Babel Style".

translations.zh-hant: 然而，插件可以透過在配置中將名稱和選項物件包裝成雙成員元組來指定選項。這種風格通常稱為「Babel 風格」。

segments.source_content: Example:
## Multi-instance plugins and plugin IDs {#multi-instance-plugins-and-plugin-ids}

translations.zh-hant: ## 多實例插件與插件 ID {#multi-instance-plugins-and-plugin-ids}

segments.source_content: All Docusaurus content plugins can support multiple plugin instances. For example, it may be useful to have [multiple docs plugin instances](./guides/docs/docs-multi-instance.mdx) or [multiple blogs](./blog.mdx#multiple-blogs). It is required to assign a unique ID to each plugin instance, and by default, the plugin ID is `default`.

translations.zh-hant: 所有 Docusaurus 內容插件都支援多個插件實例。例如，可能需要[多個文檔插件實例](./guides/docs/docs-multi-instance.mdx)或[多個部落格](./blog.mdx#multiple-blogs)。必須為每個插件實例分配唯一 ID，預設情況下插件 ID 為 `default`。

segments.source_content:
:::note

At most one plugin instance can be the "default plugin instance", by omitting the `id` attribute, or using `id: 'default'`.

:::

translations.zh-hant:
:::note

最多只能有一個插件實例是「預設插件實例」，透過省略 `id` 屬性或使用 `id: 'default'` 來實現。

:::

segments.source_content: ## Using themes {#using-themes}

Themes are loaded in the exact same way as plugins. From the consumer perspective, the `themes` and `plugins` entries are interchangeable when installing and configuring a plugin. The only nuance is that themes are loaded after plugins, and it's possible for [a theme to override a plugin's default theme components](./advanced/client.mdx#theme-aliases).

translations.zh-hant: 主題的載入方式與插件完全相同。從使用者角度來看，在安裝和配置插件時，`themes` 和 `plugins` 條目可以互換。唯一的細微差別在於主題在插件之後載入，且[主題可以覆蓋插件的預設主題組件](./advanced/client.mdx#theme-aliases)。

segments.source_content:
:::tip

The `themes` and `plugins` options lead to different [shorthand resolutions](#module-shorthands), so if you want to take advantage of shorthands, be sure to use the right entry!

:::

translations.zh-hant:
:::tip

`themes` 和 `plugins` 選項會導致不同的[簡寫解析方式](#module-shorthands)，因此若您想利用簡寫功能，請務必使用正確的條目！

:::

segments.source_content: ## Using presets {#using-presets}

Presets are bundles of plugins and themes. For example, instead of letting you register and configure `@docusaurus/plugin-content-docs`, `@docusaurus/plugin-content-blog`, etc. one after the other in the config file, we have `@docusaurus/preset-classic` preset allows you to configure them in one centralized place.

translations.zh-hant: 預設集（presets）是插件和主題的組合套件。舉例來說，與其讓您在配置文件中逐一註冊和配置 `@docusaurus/plugin-content-docs`、`@docusaurus/plugin-content-blog` 等插件，我們提供了 `@docusaurus/preset-classic` 預設集，讓您能在一個集中的位置配置它們。

segments.source_content: ### `@docusaurus/preset-classic` {#docusauruspreset-classic}
The classic preset is shipped by default to new Docusaurus websites created with [`create-docusaurus`](./installation.mdx#scaffold-project-website). It contains the following themes and plugins:

translations.zh-hant: 經典預設集預設會隨新建立的 Docusaurus 網站（透過 [`create-docusaurus`](./installation.mdx#scaffold-project-website) 創建）一起提供。它包含以下主題和插件：

segments.source_content:
- [`@docusaurus/theme-classic`](./api/themes/theme-configuration.mdx)
- [`@docusaurus/theme-search-algolia`](./api/themes/theme-search-algolia.mdx)
- [`@docusaurus/plugin-content-docs`](./api/plugins/plugin-content-docs.mdx)
- [`@docusaurus/plugin-content-blog`](./api/plugins/plugin-content-blog.mdx)
- [`@docusaurus/plugin-content-pages`](./api/plugins/plugin-content-pages.mdx)
- [`@docusaurus/plugin-debug`](./api/plugins/plugin-debug.mdx)
- [`@docusaurus/plugin-google-gtag`](./api/plugins/plugin-google-gtag.mdx)
- [`@docusaurus/plugin-google-tag-manager`](./api/plugins/plugin-google-tag-manager.mdx)
- [`@docusaurus/plugin-google-analytics`](./api/plugins/plugin-google-analytics.mdx) (**deprecated**)
- [`@docusaurus/plugin-sitemap`](./api/plugins/plugin-sitemap.mdx)
The classic preset will relay each option entry to the respective plugin/theme.

translations.zh-hant: 經典預設集會將每個選項條目轉發給相應的插件/主題。

segments.source_content: ### Installing presets {#installing-presets}
A preset is usually an npm package, so you install them like other npm packages using npm.

translations.zh-hant: 預設集通常是一個 npm 套件，因此您可以像安裝其他 npm 套件一樣使用 npm 安裝它們。

segments.source_content:
```bash npm2yarn
npm install --save @docusaurus/preset-classic
```
Then, add it in your site's `docusaurus.config.js`'s `presets` option:

translations.zh-hant: 然後，在您網站的 `docusaurus.config.js` 的 `presets` 選項中添加它：

segments.source_content: Preset paths can be relative to the config file:

translations.zh-hant: 預設集的路徑可以是相對於配置文件的相對路徑：

segments.source_content: ### Creating presets {#creating-presets}

A preset is a function with the same shape as the [plugin constructor](./api/plugin-methods/README.mdx#plugin-constructor). It should return an object of `{ plugins: PluginConfig[], themes: PluginConfig[] }`, in the same as how they are accepted in the site config. For example, you can specify a preset that includes the following themes and plugins:

translations.zh-hant: 預設集是一個與[插件構造函數](./api/plugin-methods/README.mdx#plugin-constructor)具有相同結構的函數。它應該返回一個 `{ plugins: PluginConfig[], themes: PluginConfig[] }` 的物件，與網站配置中接受的形式相同。例如，您可以指定一個包含以下主題和插件的預設集：

segments.source_content: Then in your Docusaurus config, you may configure the preset:

translations.zh-hant: 然後在您的 Docusaurus 配置中，您可以配置該預設集：

segments.source_content: This is equivalent of doing:
This is especially useful when some plugins and themes are intended to be used together. You can even link their options together, e.g. pass one option to multiple plugins.

translations.zh-hant: 這在需要將某些插件和主題一起使用時特別有用。您甚至可以將它們的選項連結在一起，例如將一個選項傳遞給多個插件。

segments.source_content: ## Module shorthands {#module-shorthands}
Docusaurus supports shorthands for plugins, themes, and presets. When it sees a plugin/theme/preset name, it tries to load one of the following, in that order:

translations.zh-hant: Docusaurus 支援插件、主題和預設集的簡寫形式。當它看到一個插件/主題/預設集名稱時，會嘗試按以下順序加載：

segments.source_content:
- `[name]` (like `content-docs`)
- `@docusaurus/[moduleType]-[name]` (like `@docusaurus/plugin-content-docs`)
- `docusaurus-[moduleType]-[name]` (like `docusaurus-plugin-content-docs`)
where `moduleType` is one of `'preset'`, `'theme'`, `'plugin'`, depending on which field the module name is declared in. The first module name that's successfully found is loaded.

translations.zh-hant: 其中 `moduleType` 是 `'preset'`、`'theme'` 或 `'plugin'` 之一，取決於模組名稱聲明在哪些欄位中。第一個成功找到的模組名稱會被加載。

segments.source_content: If the name is scoped (beginning with `@`), the name is first split into scope and package name by the first slash:

translations.zh-hant: 如果名稱是有作用域的（以 `@` 開頭），名稱會首先按第一個斜線分割為作用域和套件名稱：

segments.source_content:
```
@scope
^----^
 scope  (no name!)

@scope/awesome
^----^ ^-----^
 scope   name

@scope/awesome/main
^----^ ^----------^
 scope     name
```
If there is no name (like `@jquery`), `[scope]/docusaurus-[moduleType]` (i.e. `@jquery/docusaurus-plugin`) is loaded. Otherwise, the following are attempted:

translations.zh-hant: 若名稱不存在（如 `@jquery`），則會載入 `[scope]/docusaurus-[moduleType]`（例如 `@jquery/docusaurus-plugin`）。否則，系統會嘗試以下方式：

segments.source_content:
- `[scope]/[name]` (like `@jquery/content-docs`)
- `[scope]/docusaurus-[moduleType]-[name]` (like `@jquery/docusaurus-plugin-content-docs`)

Below are some examples, for a plugin registered in the `plugins` field. Note that unlike [ESLint](https://eslint.org/docs/user-guide/configuring/plugins#configuring-plugins) or [Babel](https://babeljs.io/docs/en/options#name-normalization) where a consistent naming convention for plugins is mandated, Docusaurus permits greater naming freedom, so the resolutions are not certain, but follows the priority defined above.

translations.zh-hant: 以下是一些在 `plugins` 欄位註冊的外掛範例。請注意，與 [ESLint](https://eslint.org/docs/user-guide/configuring/plugins#configuring-plugins) 或 [Babel](https://babeljs.io/docs/en/options#name-normalization) 不同，這些工具強制要求外掛遵循一致的命名慣例，而 Docusaurus 允許更大的命名自由，因此解析方式並非絕對，而是遵循上述定義的優先順序。

segments.source_content:
| Declaration | May be resolved as |
| --- | --- |
| `awesome` | `docusaurus-plugin-awesome` |
| `sitemap` | [`@docusaurus/plugin-sitemap`](./api/plugins/plugin-sitemap.mdx) |
| `@my-company` | `@my-company/docusaurus-plugin` (the only possible resolution!) |
| `@my-company/awesome` | `@my-company/docusaurus-plugin-awesome` |
| `@my-company/awesome/web` | `@my-company/docusaurus-plugin-awesome/web` |
